title: Scarlett Is Possessed | American Horror Stories - Episode 1: "Rubber (Wo)man - Part One" (HD Clip)
author: AHS Crave
comment: Oh yeah! The rubber suit makes a comeback after all these years. 😊🔥😈
Imagine for one moment what your body's reaction would be to being covered  in rubber. My God, you could fill a bottle with sweat after 5 minutes in the thing. Imagine a fart. It would live forever.
She made me question my sexuality because she looks extremely good! I also want a suit now 😂

To be honest I don’t like scarlet. She brutally murdered 4 girls, is into violence, overall a psychopath.
Edit: also scared her parents in a rubber suit with a knife, slashed her caring gay dads arm, has a horrible taste in girls (dates a serial killer ghost), ghost girlfriend killed her parents, and still is in the relationship with girl…
description:
Scarlett shows signs of being possessed, and then attacks her dads.
